Package edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.controller.UserController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/users")
@ExposesResourceFor(User.class)
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST Controller class for User to receive parameter values taken from HTTP requests to their respective specified URL endpoints, and returning serialized JSON object results to HTTP responses.

public java.util.Optional<User> getById​(@PathVariable

                                        org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Gets a user according to their specified ID in the database.

        auth - Security Authentication

      • setFriend

        @PutMapping(value="/{friendshipId}/friends",
            produces={"application/json","text/plain"},
            consumes={"application/json","text/plain"})
public boolean setFriend​(@PathVariable
                         java.util.UUID friendshipId,
                         @RequestBody
                         boolean friend,
                         org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Sets a User to a User's friends; otherwise, throws a NoSuchElementException if not found.
        Parameters:
        friendshipId - ID of User
        friend - True if the User is part of the other User's friends.
        auth - Security authentication
        Returns:
        True if the User is part of the other User's friends.

      • putImage

        @PutMapping(value="/me/image",
            consumes="multipart/form-data",
            produces="application/json")
public User putImage​(@RequestParam
                     org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                     org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Stores uploaded file content as an Image alongside the User who uploaded it.
        Parameters:
        file - MIME content of single file upload.
        auth - Authentication token with User principal.
        Returns:
        The image path connecting a user to an image.

      • getImage

        @GetMapping("/{id:\\p{XDigit}{8}-\\p{XDigit}{4}-\\p{XDigit}{4}-\\p{XDigit}{4}-\\p{XDigit}{12}}/image")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> getImage​(@PathVariable
                                                                                              java.util.UUID id,
                                                                                              org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Gets an image from a User
        Parameters:
        id - id of User.
        auth - Security authentication.
        Returns:
        A response if the image was retrieved.
